Summary
Multi-talented Manager with experience in Product Marketing, Business Development, and
Sales. Expertise in taking real customer requirements and developing solutions that are
valuable, innovative, and successful. Collaborative and decisive with strong communication and
interpersonal abilities.

Education
MBA
Overall GPA: 4.0. AACSB School of Business accredited
http://business.woodbury.edu/master-of-business-administration/
Industrial Engineering
http://www.iqs.edu/es/grados/ingenieria-tecnologias-industriales

Work Experience
HVAC & Water Business Development Manager
- Define marketing plan, including communication activities, training and sales for HVAC &
Water Drives and Controls.
- Launch products to market (marketing mix).
- Evaluate market and coordinate actions with Sales.
- Coordination and leadership with factories, providing feedback about market needs & trends.
HVAC Product Manager
- Chemical product range dynamization for water treatment in heating and DHW circuits. 
- Focus on the whole sales channel: manufacturers, distributors, installers and legislators.
- Product training to internal and external customers, quotations and key accounts follow-up.
- Main KPIs: turnover and gross margin.
Commercial Applications Product Manager
- Responsible for the non-domestic product portfolio (boilers > 50 kW, CHP units, heat pumps)
for the Iberian market in order to maximize operational and financial efficiency.
- Focused on market share and gross profit as the main KPIs.
- Competitors’ ongoing analysis to be aware of market evolution and potential for new
product/solution developments.
Head of the Technical Office
- Presales approach (thermal installations design and calculation).
- Constant update and follow-up of completed projects database, in cooperation with the sales
team.
Project Manager
- Solar thermal energy projects for the domestic, residential and commercial sector realization.
